data.title: Santa Maria Island, Portugal
data.meta_description: October weather forecast for Santa Maria Island, Portugal: October, the same as September, in Santa Maria Island, Portugal, is an agreeable autumn month, with an average temperature fluctuating between 16.7°C (62.1°F) and 21.9°C (71.4°F). In Santa Maria Island, in October, the average water temperature is 22°C (71.6°F).
data.text:
Average high temperature in October: 21.9°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is August (25.1°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is February (16.5°C).

Average low temperature in October: 16.7°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is August (19.2°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (11.5°C).

Average humidity in October

Santa Maria Island, Portugal

Average humidity in October: 77%

The months with the highest relative humidity are January and December (79%).

The months with the lowest relative humidity are April, May, July and August (75%).

Average rainfall days in October

Santa Maria Island, Portugal

Average rainfall days in October: 10 days

The months with the highest number of rainy days are January and December (12 days).

The months with the least rainy days are June and July (4 days).

Average sea temperature in October

Santa Maria Island, Portugal

Average sea temperature in October: 22°C

The best month for swimming (with the highest average sea temperature) is August (24°C).

The coldest months (with the lowest average sea temperature) are January, February, March and April (17°C).

Average daylight in October /

Average sunshine in October

Santa Maria Island, Portugal

Average daylight in October: 11h and 1min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 14h and 42min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 9h and 42min).

Average sunshine in October: 4h and 5min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 8h and 0min).

The month with the least sunshine is January (Average sunshine: 3h and 0min).

Average UV index in October

Santa Maria Island, Portugal

Average UV index in October: 5

The months with the highest UV index are June, July and August (UV index 9).

The months with the lowest UV index are January and December (UV index 2).
